title: [BUG] Antialias not working
body:
**Description**

Antialias for SKPaint does not work since SkiaSharp Version 1.68.1 and up
Works as expected with SkiaSharp Version 1.68.0

**Code**
```csharp
       SKPaint Paint { get; set; } = new SKPaint
        {
            Color = SKColors.Black,
            Style = SKPaintStyle.Stroke,
            StrokeCap = SKStrokeCap.Round,
            StrokeJoin = SKStrokeJoin.Round,
            StrokeWidth = 1,
            IsAntialias = true,
            FilterQuality = SKFilterQuality.High 
        };
```

**Expected Behavior**
Antialias is applied to SKPaint

**Actual Behavior**
IsAntialias has no effect

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  1.68.1 and 1.68.1.1
- Last known good version:  1.68.0
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2019 v16.4.3

- Platform Target Frameworks:  Tested against the following platforms:
  - Android: 9.0 API-Level 21
  - UWP:  1809 (10.0; Build 17763)
  - ( iOS:  Seems to work fine )

**Screenshots**
SkiaSharp 1.68.1 and up
![SkiaSharp Bug](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8405059/74137866-dec66680-4bf0-11ea-9d1f-d0691769d24f.PNG)

SkiaSharp 1.68.0
![SkiaSharp NoBug](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8405059/74138840-96a84380-4bf2-11ea-9f6e-64ad3ee23a0f.PNG)
